Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory17.jpg'}
{3: 'Despite saying it is late, Chrome does not seem to be in a hurry to part ways as you two leave the library.'}
{2: 'Back to the classroom?', 3: '5'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Chrome', 3: "Our game of chess hasn't ended yet, has it?", 4: '1'}
{3: 'You tilt your head and look at him.'}
{3: 'You seem to understand what he was thinking during that long stretch of silence.'}
{3: 'He might have figured it out then.'}
{3: 'If you were from the same year as him, the two of you would have done what you just did.'}
{3: 'You would read in the library together, discuss philosophy the way you did, stroll on the training fields around campus, and play chess in the classroom after class.'}
{3: 'After all, you have done the same at the same places... at different times.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory147.png'}
{3: 'You are back to where you ran into each other.'}
{3: 'The two of you return to your seats.'}
{3: 'The holographic chessboard lights up between you.'}
{3: 'The pieces on it are still where you left them.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Chrome', 3: "It was my turn, so now it's yours, 【kuroname】.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'White Knight moves from H4 to F5.'}
{2: 'Has your mood gone better?', 3: '27'}
{3: 'Black Pawn moves from C7 to C6.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Chrome', 3: 'There\'s no "better mood." It is inconsequential at the end of the day. I\'ve just realized something.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'White Pawn moves from G2 to G4.'}
{2: 'And what is that?', 3: '33'}
{3: 'Black Knight moves from H5 to F6.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Chrome', 3: "We'll talk after the game.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'White Knight moves from H1 to G1.'}
{3: 'The battle on the chessboard grows more intense.'}
{3: 'In the end—'}
{3: 'White Queen moves from F3 to F6.'}
{3: "Chrome's clutched fists press against his lips, him pausing to consider."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Chrome', 3: 'You sacrificed your Bishop on your 11th move.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Chrome', 3: 'You sacrificed both of your Rooks on your 18th move.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Chrome', 3: "Now you're sacrificing your Queen.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Chrome', 3: 'You have fewer pieces than I do.', 4: '1'}
{2: "You know what I've been thinking about.", 3: '51'}
{3: 'He picks up the Black Knight on G8 and takes your White Queen, placed on F6 as bait.'}
{3: 'In response, you pick up the White Bishop on D6...'}
{3: 'And move it to E7.'}
{3: 'The game is over.'}
{3: 'Chrome does not look disappointed, and you do not look gleeful either.'}
{3: 'You just stare at each other for a while before breaking into smiles.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Chrome', 3: 'When did you hatch this plan?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Same time as you did.', 3: '63'}
{2: 'Chrome', 3: 'From the very beginning, then.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'The "Immortal Game".', 3: '66'}
{2: 'Chrome', 3: 'Exactly.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Chrome and you have actually been replicating a legendary chess game.'}
{3: 'This has been a contest, but it has not been one, too. It was not a game of chess, but a game of minds.'}
{3: 'You were both gambling on the hope that the other person would make the expected move.'}
{2: 'That\'s my "answer," Chrome.', 3: '72'}

{3: 'The number of active pieces is way more important than the number of pieces a player has. Despite the inevitability of the circumstances, there are always those who can break through the boundaries and forge new paths.'}
{3: 'There are always those who think alike, who are willing to forge a new path with you.'}
{3: 'Those of Us, or Other.'}
{3: 'The most important thing is to understand each other and look for a possibility together.'}
{3: 'Even if Chrome is a Construct, and you are a human...'}
{2: "I'm sitting right here.", 3: '78'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Chrome', 3: "Yes. You're right in front of me.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'You find yourself reflected in his eyes, his blue irises as all-encompassing as the ocean.'}
{2: 'Chrome', 3: 'No. Not only you.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Without love and kindness, the power of technology will only be the power to hurt.'}
{3: 'That is it, you think. If there is no love and kindness.'}
{3: 'But not all humans have been selfish and foolish.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Chrome', 3: 'Can I expect more games like this, 【kuroname】?', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Understanding each other even when you are competing.'}
{3: 'Choosing the same path even when you stand on different sides.'}
{3: 'You make a promise.'}
{3: 'There will be more games like this.'}
{3: 'It is a promise... and a vow.'}
